description:
Shiryu is victorious, but he may never see again. He returns to China, and Ikki departs as well, leaving Saori unsure whether she can become Athena.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Kidnapped! The Crow Army Assails Saori
Yuukai! Saori o Osou Karasu Gundan
¡Secuestrada! El ejército de cuervos ataca a Saori
誘拐! 沙織を襲うカラス軍団
